definition: restless with anxiety/unbearably hot and anxious
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Her head and back felt on fire.
sentences.chinese: 她的頭和背感到火燒火燎的。

sentences.english: His tongue was stung by hot food.
sentences.chinese: 他的舌頭被辛辣食品辣得火燒火燎的。

sentences.english: While in flames, he grabbed a roll of lottery tickets and fled.
sentences.chinese: 火燒火燎中，他抓了了一卷彩票逃之夭夭。

sentences.english: Then the scar on his forehead burned like fire;
sentences.chinese: 突然，哈利額頭上的傷疤火燒火燎地痛了起來。
